## JsonCompatible.ObjectValidator type

A validator which validates a supplied `unknown` value to a valid [JsonCompatible](./ts-json-base.jsoncompatibletype.md) value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ObjectValidator<T, TC = unknown> = Validation.Classes.ObjectValidator<JsonCompatibleType<T>, TC>;
```
